message.raw: more tweaking for the nanosleep problem.  if nanosleep call with zero time is skipped altogether, physics hogs all resources not allowing visualization to update.  for now, we throttle nanosleep calls only if minimum kernel sleep time is larger than the udpate period of the physics engine.

message: more tweaking for the nanosleep problem.  if nanosleep call with zero time is skipped altogether, physics hogs all resources not allowing visualization to update.  for now, we throttle nanosleep calls only if minimum kernel sleep time is larger than the udpate period of the physics engine.
